p: Rainfall, relative humidity and temperature all showed clear seasonal variation during the study period. High rainfall levels, high relative-humidity levels and low temperature levels were observed towards the end of each year (i.e. 2011 and 2012). Relatively low rainfall and relative-humidity levels and high temperature levels were observed during May–June in 2012. Monthly time series of the averaged meteorological variables are shown in Figure 1. Summary statistics are given in Table 1.
